API_Description: Exports the XFA data of the PDF document as a string.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'exportAsXFAStr' suggests that it exports XFA (XML Forms Architecture) data as a string, similar to other export methods like 'exportAsXFDFStr'.
Returns: A string containing the XFA data of the document.
Returns_Reason: The method name includes 'Str', which typically indicates that the return type is a string representation of the data being exported.
